ingredients: ½ to ¾ tsp cumin seeds
½ a red onion chopped, ¾ cup chopped
½ tsp garam masala or use curry powder or other spice blend of choice like berbere or cajun or turkish peppery blend
¼ to ½ tsp cayenne/red chili powder
1 15 oz can chickpeas drained, or use 1.5 cups cooked
1 to 1.5 cup chopped sweet potato (or pumpkin)
1.5 to 2 cups chopped or baby spinach or 1 cup frozen (thawed)
